title: Fundamental Analysis and Writing Strategies for Enhancing Conference Proposal Quality

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Understanding of Academic Conference Proposal Structures
context.additional_context: Customized education for pre-service/in-service mathematics teachers conducted in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can identify at least three core evaluation criteria for academic conference proposals
Learners can develop proposal outlines aligned with the mission and connectivity of target academic conferences
Learners can structure research topics in mathematics education according to academic conference proposal formats

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
